revised_title: Spherical Shell of Radiation Expansion and Gravitational Fields
tldr: The author investigates the properties of a spherically symmetric shell of radiation expanding in empty space, using the principles of general relativity. They analyze the behavior of the shell and its boundaries, showing that the concept of the shell is consistent with general relativity. The study also examines the expanding shell's history and the conditions under which the shell can be considered a valid model.
